title: Environmental Factor-Based Imagination-Stimulating Mathematics Education Design Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematical concepts and organizational management experience as an administrator
context.additional_context: Applying diverse mathematical problems to real business scenarios in VR environments, fostering creative problem-solving skills through environmental factor analysis.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze organizational environmental factors to design creative approaches for solving mathematical problems.
Evaluate the ability to create mathematical models considering physical and social elements in a simulation environment.
Analyze patterns of imagination stimulation that emerge during collaborative processes among learners through formative assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
